name: Mt Pelerin Shares
public_notice: Mt Pelerin Shares has recently expanded to xDai chain. For more info, read here.

description.en: MPS tokens are the tokenized shares of Mt Pelerin Group SA, a Swiss fintech company specialized in asset tokenization. One MPS token provides direct ownership of one share of the company with voting and dividend rights.
